title: Bernie 2020 Run, Trump National Emergency & Trade
itunes:title: Bernie 2020 Run, Trump National Emergency & Trade
description:
Bloomberg’s Kevin Cirilli spoke to Republican Strategist Ryan Williams and  Democratic Strategist Dave Brown about Bernie Sanders second run for president, the latest on Trump's national emergency declaration and US/China trade talks in Washington. Bloomberg News reporter Arit John shared an update on 2020 candidates visiting New Hampshire over the weekend.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
